title: [JIT] Handle python logical operators in script
body_html:
Things like 1 and 3, etc.

import torch
@torch.jit.script
def fn(x):
    result = 1 and 3
    return x + result

x = torch.zeros(2, 3)
fn(x)


RuntimeError:
expected a tensor value but found a int:
@torch.jit.script
def fn(x):
    result = 1 and 3
             ~ <--- HERE
    return x + result
body:
Things like `1 and 3`, etc.

```
import torch
@torch.jit.script
def fn(x):
    result = 1 and 3
    return x + result

x = torch.zeros(2, 3)
fn(x)


RuntimeError:
expected a tensor value but found a int:
@torch.jit.script
def fn(x):
    result = 1 and 3
             ~ <--- HERE
    return x + result

```
